high_descs: turn left, walk towards table, stand facing the table
pick up the phone that is on the table
turn right, move to the end of table in front of lamp
turn lamp on, hold phone up to the light from the lamp
anns.task_desc: take a phone to the lamp to examine it in the light

high_descs: Take a step towards the bed and turn left. Go towards the table and look down on it.
Pick up the phone on the table.
Raise the phone up and walk towards the bed. Turn left facing the desk.
While holding the phone turn on the lamp that is on the desk.
anns.task_desc: To pick up the phone to turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Grab the phone on the table
Walk to the right a little
Turn on the lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: Grab the phone on the table, turn on the lamp
